price: 26. Nummâ Reeda woo saaku dubuk lem Racmaan kinni Rabbi, woo ayro korosul kaxxam gibdi ayró kinni.
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu lilrraḥmāni wakāna yawman ʿalā al-kāfirīna ʿasīran
